channel.title: Shodan on simeononsecurity
channel.description: Recent content in Shodan on simeononsecurity

item.title: Automate OSINT with Shodan PowerShell Modules
item.category: "OSINT" , "automation" , "Shodan" , "PowerShell" , "API" , "enumeration" , "exploits" , "network scanning" , "cybersecurity" , "information gathering" , "cyber defense" , "cyber threat intelligence" , "pentesting" , "penetration testing" , "network security" , "threat hunting" , "Shodan API" , "Shodan PowerShell" , "PowerShell Modules" , "cyber reconnaissance"
item.description: Learn to automate OSINT with the Shodan PowerShell Modules collection, which provides an interface to interact with the Shodan API for various functions such as hostname resolution, exploit searching, and more.

item.title: Shodan IP Lookup - SimeonOnSecurity
item.description: An online tool to perform a Shodan IP lookup. Retrieve information such as hostnames, open ports, tags, CPEs, and vulnerabilities associated with an IP address.
